roleset.name: to interfere in other people's affairs

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The next time expansion plans are mentioned at the old company and somebody says , `` Aw heck , guys , nobody can do it like Japan or South Korea , '' I wish you would butt in and say , `` Hold it , fellas , why do n't we compare prices and use our own little Third World country .

roleset.note: BUTT_IN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'butt' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from butt.01-v predicate notes)
